title: William Howard Taft National Historic Site: Social Media
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Social Media              Social Media       Stay Connected With YOUR National Park!           Click a social media button above to visit official William Howard Taft NHS social media pages. NPS / Tom Engberg               Look for the NPS arrowhead on a gold background for our profile pics.   Whether you're at home, at the park or on the go, you can stay connected with William Howard Taft NHS.  Use your smartphone, your tablet or your PC to find out the latest news and happenings at the park.  Look for continuous special event updates on twitter and enjoy informative posts about interesting park topics on Facebook, all updated by park staff. The following is the list of the parks User ID's:  Twitter handle is "WilliamTaftNPS" Like us on Facebook as "William Howard Taft National Historic Site"
